mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into api_farm( id , SN , VillageName , HostName , Phone , Images , Sow , Boar , CommercialPig , DairyCow , Cattle , Goat , Sheep , LayingHen , Dorking , LayingDuck , MeatDuck , Goose , Other , HasPool , X , Y , Town , Owner , Area , Purpose , BuildDate , HasRecord , deleted , etlTime )values ( #{id}, #{SN}, #{VillageName}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{HostName},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e' )), #{Images}, #{Sow}, #{Boar}, #{CommercialPig}, #{DairyCow}, #{Cattle}, #{Goat}, #{Sheep}, #{LayingHen}, #{Dorking}, #{LayingDuck}, #{MeatDuck}, #{Goose}, #{Other}, #{HasPool}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Town}, #{Owner}, #{Area}, #{Purpose}, #{BuildDate}, #{HasRecord}, #{deleted}, #{etlTime} )

insert IGNORE into api_housing( id , IdCardNo , HouseholdNo , LiveProperty , BuildingProperty , BuildingUsage , UpLayerNum , DownLayerNum , NumPerLayer , HourseStatus , HourseUsage , HourseCode , Address , Town , VillageName , deleted , etlTime )values ( #{id}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), #{HouseholdNo}, #{LiveProperty}, #{BuildingProperty}, #{BuildingUsage}, #{UpLayerNum}, #{DownLayerNum}, #{NumPerLayer}, #{HourseStatus}, #{HourseUsage}, #{HourseCode}, #{Address}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, #{deleted}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_idlecourtyard( id , SN , VillageName , Pos , LandType , Area , Appendant , UsageStatus , Contractor , IdCardNo , ContractorPhone , Principal , PrincipalPhone , Images , X , Y , Town , Location , Purpose , Materiel , Lessor , GridMember , Phone , etlTime )values ( #{id}, #{SN}, #{VillageName}, #{Pos}, #{LandType}, #{Area}, #{Appendant}, #{UsageStatus}, #{Contractor}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{ContractorPhone},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Principal},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{PrincipalPhone},'e' )), #{Images}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Town}, #{Location}, #{Purpose}, #{Materiel}, #{Lessor}, #{GridMember}, #{Phone}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_latrinereform( Id , IdCardNo , HouseholdNo , Name , Relation , Committee , Address , DryToilet , DryToiletType , DryToiletUsageType , HourseCode , Gas2Coal , Ele2Coal , X , Y , Town , ToiletType , ToiletDryDate , IsMaintain , HeatType , HeatDryDate , Image , HeatImage , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), #{HouseholdNo}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Name},'e' )), #{Relation}, #{Committee}, #{Address}, #{DryToilet}, #{DryToiletType}, #{DryToiletUsageType}, #{HourseCode}, #{Gas2Coal}, #{Ele2Coal}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Town}, #{ToiletType}, #{ToiletDryDate}, #{IsMaintain}, #{HeatType}, #{HeatDryDate}, #{Image}, #{HeatImage}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_ninesmallplaces( id , VillageName , CompanyName , CompanyType , PersonInCharge , IdCardNo , Phone , SmX , SmY , Pos , comment , ImageNo , Town , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, #{VillageName}, #{CompanyName}, #{CompanyType}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{PersonInCharge},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e' )), #{SmX}, #{SmY}, #{Pos}, #{comment}, #{ImageNo}, #{Town}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_poolbay( id , SN , Town , Name , Pos , Situation , X , Y , Comment , images , Person , Purpose , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, #{SN}, #{Town}, #{Name}, #{Pos}, #{Situation}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Comment}, #{images}, #{Person}, #{Purpose}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_rubbishclear( Id , SN , Town , VillageName , Name , X , Y , Pos , Situation , Texture , ImageNo , ImageUrl , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, #{SN}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, #{Name}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Pos}, #{Situation}, #{Texture}, #{ImageNo}, #{ImageUrl}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_waterwell( ID , SmX , SmY , SmLibTileID , SmUserID , SmGeometrySize , SmGeoPosition , DotNo , VillageName , WellCode , Name , Pos , Depth , WaterLevel , ImageNo , Town , Phone , comment , EtlTime )values ( #{ID}, #{SmX}, #{SmY}, #{SmLibTileID}, #{SmUserID}, #{SmGeometrySize}, #{SmGeoPosition}, #{DotNo}, #{VillageName}, #{WellCode}, #{Name}, #{Pos}, #{Depth}, #{WaterLevel}, #{ImageNo}, #{Town}, #{Phone}, #{comment}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_xinjiaorenyuan( Id , Name , Gender , Phone , MinZu , WenHuaChengDu , ZhengZhiMianMao , GongZuoDanWeiZhiWu , XinYangZongJiao , IdCardNo , HuJiDi , XianJuZhuDi , JuHuiDiDian , Town , VillageName , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Name},'e' )), #{Gender}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e' )), #{MinZu}, #{WenHuaChengDu}, #{ZhengZhiMianMao}, #{GongZuoDanWeiZhiWu}, #{XinYangZongJiao}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), #{HuJiDi}, #{XianJuZhuDi}, #{JuHuiDiDian}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_zhongliangdahu( Id , AuditState , Town , VillageName , Name , Area , Varieties , Phone , EtlTime )values ( #{Id}, #{AuditState}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Name},'e' )), #{Area}, #{Varieties}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e' )), now() )
